svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-10-16T13:21:44.047Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:102.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/102.0" etag="Rd9BleEQr3rY2yWibVzi" version="22.0.4" type="github"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="XrWe5h4D1xy4Jonz3m_l"> <mxGraphModel dx="1434" dy="759" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="4rsjQmKJYwaXbKbMH758-1" value="Controller" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="240" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4rsjQmKJYwaXbKbMH758-2" value="Bridge" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="240" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4rsjQmKJYwaXbKbMH758-3" value="End Bridge" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="240" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4rsjQmKJYwaXbKbMH758-5" value="<div>Convert the packet to lower speed bus.</div><div><br></div><div>Have minimum processing power(states machines, ASIC).</div><div><br></div><div>Can be intregrated into sensor or other device.<br></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="440" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4rsjQmKJYwaXbKbMH758-6" value="<div>Convert the packet to higher ot equal (Ex.:USB) speed bus. <br></div><div><br></div><div>Have minimum processing power(states machines,ASIC)</div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="400" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4rsjQmKJYwaXbKbMH758-8" value="<div>Generate packet to control the bus. Can also act as a bridge.</div><div><br></div><div>Have medium to high processing power</div><div>(MCU,CPU)</div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="410" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4rsjQmKJYwaXbKbMH758-9" value="<h1>Type of Device<br></h1>There is 3 type of Device that can be connected to the bus: Controller, Bridge and End Bridge. " style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="100" width="190" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div: Convert the packet to lower speed bus.
Have minimum processing power(states machines, ASIC).
Can be intregrated into sensor or other device.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 58px; height: 1px; padding-top: 325px; margin-left: 251px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div: Convert the packet to higher ot equal (Ex.:USB) speed bus.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 58px; height: 1px; padding-top: 335px; margin-left: 11px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div: Generate packet to control the bus. Can also act as a bridge.
Have medium to high processing power

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Type of Device
There is 3 type of Device that can be connected to the bus: Controller, Bridge and End Bridge.
